name: Soft Animals, Soft Drinks
description:
Soft Animals, Soft Drinks is a daily routine shop simulator game created in 2 weeks for the Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2023 game jam. It is a cute 2D drink-making game set in Bermodo City, inhabited by soft animals who happen to love soft drinks. Take orders, make the right drinks for the right customers, and win their favor in the next few days.

Story

   Your Aunt Dora has headed into retirement, and has left her beloved “Aunt Dora’s Pop Shop” in your name to carry on the torch. After the first few days, you start to notice the same customers coming in and ordering the same drinks. You must commit these drinks to memory, but it doesn’t hurt that your aunt has left you a handy recipe book (thanks, Aunt Dora!) in case you forget some details. Serve your regulars and get to know them while doing so.

Controls:

Use the mouse to interact.

Credits:

Design, Coding and Programming: Réjean Lagassé and Justin Reece
